tool.name: DE Seq
tool.description: Run Differential Expression analysis from SAM To Count data

param.name: counts
param.label: Counts file (from sam2counts)
param.help: Must have same number of samples as the column types field. E.g. if the column types field is 'kidney,kidney,liver,liver', then there must be 4 sample columns in the counts file.

param.name: column_types
param.label: Column Types in counts file
param.help: A comma separated list (no spaces) of the types of the data columns using the same name for replicates. E.g. kidney,kidney,kidney,liver,liver,liver

validator.message: Must be a comma-separated list with no spaces

param.name: comparison
param.label: Comparison type
param.help: A comma separated tuple (no spaces) of the comparison you want to do. Must use the names from the Column Types list. E.g. comparing kidney to liver: kidney,liver. Comparing liver to kidney: liver,kidney

validator.message: Must be a comma-separated tuple with no spaces

tool.help: NOTE: This DEseq Galaxy tool can only be run on counts files that are created from SAM files that have been aligned to a transcriptome.
